summary: A new quest for Skyrim that allows you to purchase Stalhrim armor and weapons and unlock the ability to craft with Stalhrim without going to Solstheim.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new quest for Skyrim that allows you to purchase Stalhrim armor and weapons and unlock the ability to craft with Stalhrim without going to Solstheim. To start the quest talk to Sorri the Sailor in Windpeak Inn in Dawnstar. If you get stuck in the quest download the game guide. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1022/?]here[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim
Dragonborn
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62698/?]TES5LODGen[/url]

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder. Then Download and run [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62698/?]TES5LODGen[/url] and run the application and check off Tamriel in LODGen Options and then click on Generate.
author: LegoManIAm94
